name: HackerEarth
description: HackerEarth is the leading developer assessment software trusted by over 1,000 companies worldwide to accurately measure developer skills during recruitment. By streamlining the screening process, it enhances engineering hire quality and reduces recruiter workload. We have cultivated a vibrant community of over 4.5 million developers who engage in hackathons and coding challenges to hone their skills and compete globally.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Ditch resumes, assess coding skills effectively with HackerEarth's skill-first hiring.
ShortDescription: The tech behind building greattech teams.

Highlights.name: Full Hiring Lifecycle Support
Highlights.description: Go beyond interviews with a platform for skill-based assessments, collaborative coding, and learning & development.

Highlights.name: Data-Driven Insights
Highlights.description: Assess skills, not resumes, with data-driven insights throughout the hiring process.

Highlights.name: Engaged Developer Community
Highlights.description: Access a massive developer community (10M+) for hiring challenges, hackathons, and employer branding.

enhanced_description: HackerEarth is a leading developer assessment software that enables skill-first hiring, moving beyond resumes to accurately measure coding skills during recruitment. It supports the full technical hiring lifecycle by providing skill-based assessments, collaborative coding environments, and detailed analytics for data-driven insights. By streamlining the screening process, HackerEarth aims to enhance engineering hire quality and reduce recruiter workload, helping companies hire top technical talent faster and more efficiently. Furthermore, HackerEarth fosters accelerated skill development and learning efficiency through its massive community of over 10 million developers who actively engage in hackathons and coding challenges, offering unique opportunities for employer branding and talent sourcing.
key_use_cases: Improving the quality of engineering hires
Reducing recruiter workload in tech talent acquisition
Supporting ongoing developer skill development and learning
Running hackathons and coding challenges for talent acquisition
Employer branding within the developer community
competitive_advantages: Skill-first hiring approach, de-emphasizing resumes for coding skill assessment
Access to a massive and engaged developer community (10M+) for talent sourcing and employer branding
Comprehensive support for the full technical hiring lifecycle, including assessments, collaborative coding, and learning & development
Provides data-driven insights throughout the hiring process
Improves candidate experience during the assessment process
Designed to reduce recruiter workload for technical hiring
Supports accelerated skill development and learning efficiency
roi_benefits: Faster and more efficient hiring of top technical talent
Accelerated skill development and learning efficiency
